thread.title: Justin Bieber breaks silence on nude photos: 'I feel super violated'
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber breaks silence on nude photos: 'I feel super violated'

title: Justin Bieber breaks silence on nude photos: 'I feel super violated'
text:
Saturday, Oct 17 2015, 07:43 BST Share on Facebook Share on Google+ Justin Bieber has opened up for the first time about those nude photos.He revealed his thoughts about the long-lens paparazzi photographs to Access Hollywood 's Billy Bush in a new interview. 
Â© Getty Images / Steve Granitz/WireImage "My first thing was like... how can they do this? I feel super violated," Bieber said."I feel like I can't step outside and feel like I can go outside naked. You should feel comfortable in your own space, especially that far away."He also joked that the photos didn't exactly cover his package in its full glory: "That was shrinkage for me."His new album Purpose will be released November 13, where it will go head-to-head with One Direction's latest effort .Bieber's full interview with Access Hollywood airs in the US on October 19.
